conversation.content: Good morning. I'd like to review the terms and conditions for your Premier Rewards loyalty program before enrolling.

Good morning and thank you for your interest in Premier Rewards. I'd be happy to walk you through our program structure, which has three tiers: Silver starting at zero points, Gold at 5,000 points annually, and Platinum at 15,000 points.
What exactly qualifies as an eligible purchase for earning points?

Excellent question. Most purchases earn points at our standard rate of 2 points per dollar, with exclusions for gift cards, taxes, shipping fees, and items coded as category EX-47 which includes clearance merchandise marked down more than 70 percent.
Are there any annual fees or expiration dates I should be aware of?
Certainly. The program itself has no annual fees. However, points expire after 24 months of account inactivity, which we define as no earning or redemption transactions during that period.
What happens to my points if I need to return a purchase?

When you process a return, the points earned from that transaction are automatically deducted from your balance. If you've already redeemed those points, your account may show a negative balance until offset by future purchases, as outlined in section 4.3 of our terms.
Can I transfer points to another member or combine household accounts?

Points are non-transferable between members. However, you can link up to 3 accounts within the same household using our Family Connect feature, which requires verification code FC-2024 and proof of shared address.
What are the redemption options and minimum thresholds?

You can redeem points starting at 500 points for a $5 reward certificate. We also offer exclusive experiences starting at 10,000 points, and our catalog code CAT-PR-2024 lists over 200 brand partner rewards.
How quickly are points credited after making a purchase?
Points post to your account within 48 hours for in-store purchases and 72 hours for online orders, once the transaction clears our processing system PRX-7.
Is there a limit to how many points I can earn annually?

Absolutely no earning limits. Our highest-tier member last year accumulated 127,000 points. The only restriction is our fraud prevention protocol FP-001, which may flag unusual purchasing patterns for review.
Can I earn points on purchases made before enrolling in the program?
Unfortunately not. Points accumulation begins from your enrollment date forward. We cannot retroactively apply points to previous purchases, as stated in our membership agreement section 2.1.
How do I track my point balance and tier status?

Perfect timing to ask. You can monitor everything through our mobile app, your online account dashboard, or by calling our dedicated rewards line at 800-555-7829. You'll also receive monthly statements showing your current balance and progress toward the next tier.

scenario: asking about loyalty program terms and conditions
